articles.description: A total of 153,193 people attended the first four days of Wimbledon, the smallest amount of spectators since 2007 when 148,986 people went to the games prompting a 'cut' to staff numbers.
articles.content:
Staff claim they are being sacked at Wimbledon for small transgressions like going to watch the tennis on Henman Hill after low turnout at the grand slam.
A total of 153,193 people attended the firs… [+9449 chars]
